00135             function                select_list( $id )
00136             {
00137                   try
00138                   {
00139                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'string' );
00140                         
00141                         $id = explode( ',' , $id );
00142 
00143                         $Return = array();
00144                         
00145                         foreach( $id as $k => $v )
00146                         {
00147                               $Return [] = array( 'content' => $this->Security->get( $this->get_content( $v ) , 'string' ) );
00148                         }
00149                         
00150                         return( $Return );
00151                   }
00152                   catch( Exception $e )
00153                   {
00154                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00155                   }
00156             }

00180             function                update( $id , $Record )
00181             {
00182                   try
00183                   {
00184                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'string' );
00185                         $id = explode( ',' , $id );
00186                         
00187                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( $Record , 'content:string' , 'allow_not_set' );
00188                         $Content = get_field( $Record , 'content' );
00189                         $Content = $this->Security->get( $Content , 'unsafe_string' );
00190                         
00191                         foreach( $id as $k => $v )
00192                         {
00193                               $this->CachedMultyFS->file_put_contents( $this->get_content_path( $v ) , $Content );
00194                         }
00195                   }
00196                   catch( Exception $e )
00197                   {
00198                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00199                   }
00200             }

00224             function                try_virtual_path( $VirtualPath )
00225             {
00226                   try
00227                   {
00228                         $Path = false;
00229                         if( $this->AddCondition !== false )
00230                         {
00231                               $Path = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_file_path( $VirtualPath."_$this->AddCondition" , false );
00232                         }
00233                         
00234                         if( $Path === false )
00235                         {
00236                               $VirtualPath = $VirtualPath;
00237                               $Path = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_file_path( $VirtualPath , false );
00238                         }
00239                         
00240                         return( $Path );
00241                   }
00242                   catch( Exception $e )
00243                   {
00244                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00245                   }
00246             }

00270             function                get_content_path( $Content )
00271             {
00272                   try
00273                   {
00274                         $Content = $this->Security->get( $Content , 'command' );
00275                         
00276                         $VirtualPath = dirname( __FILE__ )."/$Content";
00277                         if( ( $Path = $this->try_virtual_path( $VirtualPath ) ) !== false )
00278                         {
00279                               return( $Path );
00280                         }
00281                         
00282                         $VirtualPath = dirname( __FILE__ )."/data/$Content";
00283                         if( ( $Path = $this->try_virtual_path( $VirtualPath ) ) !== false )
00284                         {
00285                               return( $Path );
00286                         }
00287                         
00288                         $VirtualPath = dirname( __FILE__ )."/data/static_content/$Content";
00289                         if( ( $Path = $this->try_virtual_path( $VirtualPath ) ) !== false )
00290                         {
00291                               return( $Path );
00292                         }
00293                         
00294                         return( false );
00295                   }
00296                   catch( Exception $e )
00297                   {
00298                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00299                   }
00300             }

00324             function                get_content( $Content )
00325             {
00326                   try
00327                   {
00328                         $Path = $this->get_content_path( $Content );
00329                         
00330                         if( $Path !== false && $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $Path ) )
00331                         {
00332                               return( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $this->get_content_path( $Content ) ) );
00333                         }
00334                         else
00335                         {
00336                               return( '' );
00337                         }
00338                   }
00339                   catch( Exception $e )
00340                   {
00341                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00342                   }
00343             }

00375             function                get_package_template( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $Template )
00376             {
00377                   try
00378                   {
00379                         $PackageName = $this->Security->get( $PackageName , 'string' );
00380                         $PackageVersion = $this->Security->get( $PackageVersion , 'string' );
00381                         $Template = $this->Security->get( $Template , 'string' );
00382                         
00383                         $Path = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion )."/res/templates/$Template";
00384                         
00385                         return( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $Path ) );

00423             function                get_package_content( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $Content )
00424             {
00425                   try
00426                   {
00427                         $PackageName = $this->Security->get( $PackageName , 'string' );
00428                         $PackageVersion = $this->Security->get( $PackageVersion , 'string' );
00429                         $Content = $this->Security->get( $Content , 'command' );
00430                         
00431                         $PackagePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00432                         
00433                         $Path = $this->try_virtual_path( $PackagePath."/data/$Content" );
00434                         
00435                         if( $Path === false )
00436                         {
00437                               $Path = $this->try_virtual_path( $PackagePath."/data/static_content/$Content" );
00438                         }
00439                         
00440                         return( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $Path ) );
00441                   }
00442                   catch( Exception $e )
00443                   {
00444                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00445                   }
00446             }

00470             function                get_content_ex( $Options )
00471             {
00472                   try
00473                   {
00474                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'package_name' , false ) === false )
00475                         {
00476                               return( $this->get_content( $Options->get_setting( 'content' ) ) );
00477                         }
00478                         else
00479                         {
00480                               $PackageName = $Options->get_setting( 'package_name' );
00481                               $PackageVersion = $Options->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
00482                               
00483                               if( $Options->get_setting( 'template' , false ) )
00484                               {
00485                                     $FileName = $Options->get_setting( 'template' );
00486                                     return( $this->get_package_template( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $FileName ) );
00487                               }
00488                               else
00489                               {
00490                                     $FileName = $Options->get_setting( 'content' );
00491                                     return( $this->get_package_content( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $FileName ) );
00492                               }
00493                         }
00494                   }
00495                   catch( Exception $e )
00496                   {
00497                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00498                   }
00499             }
